text: Be-shak Allah Taalaa hi kay pass qayamat ka ilm hai wohi barish nazil farmata hai aur maa kay pet mein jo hai ussay janta hai. Koi (bhi) nahi janta kay kal kiya (kuch) keray ga? Na kissi ko yeh maloom hai kay kiss zamin mein maray ga (yaad rakho) Allah Taalaa ho pooray ilm wala aur sahih khabron wala hai
